entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
